elements.name: Id
elements.title: PaM Id
elements.tooltip: Use this to order the PaMs to your convenience

elements.name: Title
elements.title: Name of PaM or group of PaMs
elements.tooltip: A group of PaMs consists of other single PaMs or another group of PaMs

elements.name: TitleNational
elements.title: Name of PaM or group of PaMs in national language

elements.name: IsGroup
elements.title: Is this a single PaM or a group of PaMs?

elements.name: ListOfSinglePams
elements.title: Which policies or measures does it cover?

elements.name: Id
elements.title: PaM Id
elements.tooltip: Use this to order the PaMs to your convenience

elements.name: Title
elements.title: Name of PaM or group of PaMs
elements.tooltip: A group of PaMs consists of other single PaMs or another group of PaMs

elements.name: TitleNational
elements.title: Name of PaM or group of PaMs in national language

elements.name: IsGroup
elements.title: Is this a single PaM or a group of PaMs?

elements.name: ListOfSinglePams
elements.title: Which policies or measures does it cover?

elements.name: IsPolicyMeasureEnvisaged
elements.title: Is the policy or measure envisaged with a view to limiting GHG emissions beyond the Member State commitments under Regulation (EU) 2018/842 and Regulation (EU) 2018/841

elements.name: GHGAffected
elements.title: Greenhouse gas(es) affected
elements.tooltip: More than one GHG can be selected

elements.name: Objective
elements.title: Select Objective(s)
elements.tooltip: Objective means ‘initial statement of the outcomes (including results and impacts) intended to be achieved by the intervention’. More than one objective can be selected, additional objectives could be added and specified under ‘other’ For Other a briefdescription of the objective shall be provided

elements.name: QuantifiedObjective
elements.title: Quantified Objective
elements.tooltip: Quantified objectives shall be specific, measurable, achievable,relevant and time-related. As a minimum, the figure(s), unit(s), end year and base yearshall be included if the objective(s) is(are) quantified

elements.name: AssessmentContribution
elements.title: Assessment of the contribution of the policy or measure to the achievement of the long-term strategy referred to in Article 15 Regulation (EU) 2018/1999
Union policy which resulted in the implementation of the PaM
elements.tooltip: Only Union policy/policies that are implemented through the national policy or where national policies are aimed directly at meeting the objectives of Union policies shall be listed. Union policies are organized by sector that is most likely applicable. The selected ‘Sector(s) affected’ can differ from the sector(s) listed here. More than one Union policy can be selected, additional union policies could be added and specified under 'other'. Sectors are not listed in alphabetical order

value: Other (Union policy not listed above or additional Union policy)

elements.name: PaMRelateAirQuality
elements.title: Does the PaM relate to Air Pollution policy?
elements.tooltip: 'Yes' shall be selected if the PaM has been reported under Directive (EU) 2016/2284

elements.name: StatusImplementation
elements.title: Status of implementation
elements.tooltip: Expired PaMs must be reported in the template only if they have an effect, or they are expected to continue to have an effect on GHG emissions

elements.name: ImplementationPeriodComment
elements.title: Comment on Implementation Period
elements.tooltip: Provide any remark on Implementation Period of the PaM

elements.name: ProjectionsScenario
elements.title: Projections scenario in which the PaM is included

elements.name: Entities
elements.title: Entities responsible for implementing the policy

elements.name: Indicators
elements.title: Indicators used to monitor and evaluate progress over time (ex-post or ex-ante)

elements.name: Reference
elements.title: Reference to assessments and underpinning technical reports

elements.name: Title
elements.title: Name of PaM or group of PaMs
elements.tooltip: A group of PaMs consists of other single PaMs or another group of PaMs

elements.name: PolicyImpacting
elements.title: Policy impacting EU ETS, LULUCF and/or ESD/ESR emissions
elements.tooltip: More than one can be selected

elements.title: GHG emissions reductions for year 2025 (kt CO2-equivalent per year)

elements.name: LULUCF_1
elements.title: LULUCF
elements.tooltip: Enhanced removals or decreasedemissions of GHG shall be expressed as a positive number. Decreased removals orincreased emissions shall be expressed as a negative number

elements.name: Total_1
elements.title: Total
elements.tooltip: In this field, the total of the EU ETS and ESR sectors shall be entered if the split between EU ETS and ESR is not available

elements.title: GHG emissions reductions for year 2030 (kt CO2-equivalent per year)

elements.name: Explanation
elements.title: Explanation of the basis for the mitigation estimates

elements.name: Documentation_AnteAssessment
elements.title: Documentation / Source of estimation if available
Ex-post assessment
elements.tooltip: Ex-post evaluations include all evaluations based on results from parts of, or the whole implementation period. Ex-post assessments for more than one year may be reported, where available reporting shall focus on years ending with 0 or 5

elements.name: GHG_emissions
elements.title: GHG emissions reductions (kt CO2-equivalent per year)

elements.name: Value_LULUCF
elements.title: LULUCF
elements.tooltip: Enhanced removals or decreased emissions of GHG shall be expressed as a positive number. Decreased removals or increased emissions shall be expressed as a negative number

elements.tooltip: In this field, the total of the EU ETS and ESR sectors shall be entered if the split between EU ETS and ESR is not available

elements.name: ProjectedYear
elements.title: Year(s) for which cost has been calculated
elements.tooltip: Provide a year or a range of years (e.g 2010-2015)

elements.name: ProjectedCost
elements.title: Gross costs in EUR per tonne CO2eq reduced/sequestered

elements.name: ProjectedAbsoluteCost
elements.title: Absolute gross costs per year in EUR
Benefit
elements.tooltip: A benefit shall be indicated in the template as a negative cost

elements.name: ProjectedBenefit
elements.title: Benefits in EUR per tonne CO2eq reduced/ sequestered
elements.tooltip: A benefit shall be indicated in the template as a negative cost.

elements.name: ProjectedAbsoluteBenefit
elements.title: Absolute benefit per year in EUR
elements.tooltip: A benefit shall be indicated in the template as a negative cost.

elements.name: ProjectedNetCost
elements.title: Net costs in EUR per tonne CO2eq reduced/ sequestered

elements.name: ProjectedAbsoluteNetCost
elements.title: Absolute net cost per year in EUR

elements.name: ProjectedDescriptionCost
elements.title: Description of cost estimates (basis for cost estimate, what type of costs are included in the estimate, methodology)
elements.tooltip: The description shall include the type of costs and benefits that have been taken into consideration, the stakeholders considered in the assessment of costs and benefits, the baseline against which costs and benefits are compared, and the methodology

elements.name: RealizedYear
elements.title: Year(s) for which cost has been calculated
elements.tooltip: Provide a year or a range of years (e.g 2010-2015)

elements.name: RealizedCost
elements.title: Gross costs in EUR per tonne CO2eq reduced/sequestered

elements.title: Absolute gross costs per year in EUR
